overview: The project has undergone a major transformation from a basic counter app to Gyde, a sophisticated luxury chauffeur service application. The system now incorporates comprehensive authentication flows, profile management, booking systems, and payment processing, all implemented with a dark theme UI design.
key_events: Implementation of authentication system with phone and email verification
Addition of profile setup flow with business/personal modes
Implementation of location services and map integration
user_requests: Transform app into luxury chauffeur service called Gyde
Implement comprehensive authentication flow with sliding transitions
Create profile setup flow with mode selection and package options
Develop homepage layout with chauffeur profiles and service categories
Implement booking flows for one-way, multi-stop, and hourly bookings
system_responses: Designed high-level plan for app transformation
Created architectural framework for new features and services
Established new service layers for authentication, location, and payment processing
Developed comprehensive UI components following dark theme
Implemented MVVM architecture using Stacked framework
current_state: The application has evolved into a full-featured luxury chauffeur service with multiple integrated systems. The architecture has been expanded to include new service layers for authentication, location services, and payment processing. The UI follows a dark theme design throughout all new components, with proper attention to user experience and professional features. The system now supports complex user flows including authentication, profile management, and various booking options, with proper state management and error handling implemented.
